Inicio Seguidores Solares Tipo de Seguidores Proveedores Nosotros Bibliografía

Bibliografía

  1. O. a. D. A. a. J. A. Haris, «Efficiency Analysis of Using Solar Panel System Tracker to Static Solar Panel,» de 2021 IEEE 7th International Conference on Computing, Engineering and Design (ICCED), pp. 1-6, 2021.
  2. P. U. P. B. M. S. S. P. S. V. G. Krishna Kumba, «Solar tracking systems: Advancements, challenges, and future directions: A review,» de Energy Reports, vol. 12, pp. 3566-3583, 2024.
  3. M. T. C. A. H. A.-W. K. S. Hussein A. Kazem, «Recent advancements in solar photovoltaic tracking systems: An in-depth review of technologies, performance metrics, and future trends.,» de Solar Energy, vol. 282, 2024.
  4. M. T. A. a. T. S. S. a. R. R. a. A. S. M. S. Khan, «Design and construction of an automatic solar tracking system,» de International Conference on Electrical & Computer Engineering (ICECE 2010), pp. 326-329, 2010.
  5. P. Gevorkian, «Solar-Tracking Systems,» de Large-Scale Solar Power System Design: An Engineering Guide for Grid-Connected Solar Power Generation, 1st Edition, New York, McGraw-Hill Education, 2011.
  6. A.-H. I. a. S. H. a. A. N. a. A. A. H. a. I. M. a. A. A. S. Mourad, «A state-of-the-art review: Solar trackers,» de 2022 Advances in Science and Engineering Technology International Conferences (ASET), pp. 1-5, 2022.
  7. S. a. P. V. S. a. A. C. S. a. R. K. S. Venkateshwarlu, «A Comparative Evaluation of Various Solar Trackers to Harness Maximum Energy - A Brief Review,» de 2022 International Conference on Smart and Sustainable Technologies in Energy and Power Sectors (SSTEPS), Mahendragarh, 2022.
  8. P. Gevorkian, «3. SOLAR POWER SYSTEM PHYSICS AND TECHNOLOGIES,» de Alternative Energy Systems in Building Design, 1st Edition, New York, McGraw-Hill Education, 2010.
  9. H. S. N., A. A. H., A. M. I., A. S. A., A. A., H. I. Mourad, «IEEE Xplore,» 2022. [En línea]. Available: https://ieeexplore-ieee-org.ezproxy.uv.mx/document/9735074 . [Último acceso: 15/11/2024].
  10. A. S. a. R. V. M. a. S. Y. Z. a. L. D. Y. Petrusev, «Solar tracker with active orientation,» de 2016 2nd International Conference on Industrial Engineering, Applications and Manufacturing (ICIEAM), pp. 1-4, 2016.
  11. I. M. P. D. Y. S. E. S. A. A. Z. a. A. A. I. H. Rosma, «Analysis of Single Axis Sun Tracker System to Increase Solar Photovoltaic Energy Production in the Tropics,,» de 2018 2nd International Conference on Electrical Engineering and Informatics (ICon EEI), pp. 183-186, 2018.
  12. J. F. L. a. N. A. Rahim, «Performance comparison of dual-axis solar tracker vs static solar system in Malaysia,,» de 2013 IEEE Conference on Clean Energy and Technology (CEAT), Langkawi, Malaysia, 2013.
